text:
Ralph Jimmy Schulz (22 October 1968 – 25 November 2019) was a German technology businessman and politician. He was a member of the Bundestag from 2009 to 2013 and again from 2017 until his death in 2019. Schulz founded and sold an internet service provider called Cyber Solutions GmbH.
In June 2019, Schulz was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer. He died on 25 November 2019 in Hohenbrunn of the disease, aged 51.
